works.description:
The original work is self explanatory.  
Compiling this information took hours of research

The Bloggers took the compiled information we published, ignored our  
copyright notice, including all of our comments. Notwithstanding that, no 

credit was given.

Note that the second and subsequent allegedly infringing URLs took  
substantially all the text from our web page as it existed from 2009.

On the 1st one The Blogger user copied the information from our webpage as
 
it existed 2/9/2012.Note that we have updated the original work on  
3/12/2012. All of these infringements were "lifted" from our corporate  
website at www.4structures.com

The very user name of the second blogger "grabssinfo" (grab structured  
settlement info) is a statement of intent!
